questions.title: 音乐会将如期举办除非有台风。
questions.answer: The concert will be held as scheduled unless there is a typhoon.

questions.title: 除非你想，否则我不会为你准备饭菜。
questions.answer: I will not prepare some food for you unless you want.

questions.title: 除非你送我1000朵玫瑰，否则我不会原谅你。
questions.answer: I will not forgive you unless you can send me 1，000 roses.

questions.title: 快点，宝贝，除非你快点起床，否则你赶不上校车。
questions.answer: Quickly baby, you can't catch the school bus unless you wake up quickly.

questions.title: 除非汤姆认真学习，否则他考不上这所大学。
questions.answer: Tom will never walk into the college unless he can study hard.

title: ——你和你的老公吵架了？你为什么不打电话给他？
——除非他先打给我，要不我不会打给他的。

answer.en: Do you quarrel with your husband?Why don't you call him?
I will not call him unless he call me first.

title: ——你为什么一回家就把牛奶放进冰箱？
——因为如果不把牛奶放进冰箱就会不新鲜。

answer.en: Why do you put milk into fridge as soon as you come back?
Because it will not keep fresh unless it is refrigerated.

title: ——除非你说真话，要不我不相信你。
——这就是我的真话。

answer.en: I will not trust you unless you can tell the truth.
